getTasksByUser

public java.util.List<Task> getTasksByUser(java.net.URI userUri,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> tagList)
Retrieves a task dataset by associated user and tag

Parameters:
userUri - selects task records associated with this user uri
tagUri - (optional) filter resulting set to only include tasks associated with this list of tags
Returns:
Cursor for a task dataset containing rows matching this request
